body.p: Because there is little, if any, trading activity to support a valuation technique using a market approach, Entity A decides to use an income approach using the discount rate adjustment technique described in paragraphs B18–B22 of the IFRS to measure the fair value of the residential mortgage‑backed security at the measurement date. Entity A uses the contractual cash flows from the residential mortgage‑backed security (see also paragraphs 67 and 68 of the IFRS).
